plot: In a blind world, an old man named Patricio travels out of town next to Victor, a man with a machine that can record sounds of the past.
title: Memoria de la lluvia

plot_en: In a blind world, an old man named Patricio travels out of town next to Victor, a man with a machine that can record sounds of the past.
